msg: (notify): Add missing space after minus sign.

author: hwright
msg: When walking ancestry, discover merging revisions, notify consumers of them,
(svn_repos__walk_ancestry): Check for merging revisions, and report them.

author: dlr
msg: Prepare test cases for change in "merge begin" notification output.
(expected_merge_output): Add new function to generate a nasy regex
that's intended to match merge output.
Use expected_merge_output() in place of svntest.main.merge_notify_line().
